item.title: Within one week of the implementation of the Hong Kong Stablecoin Regulation, the size of the local OTC trading market has decreased by approximately 32.94%.
item.description: On August 12th, as per Bitrace's monitoring, within a week after the implementation of the Hong Kong stablecoin regulations, the local OTC market size has witnessed a reduction of approximately 32.94%. The daily average USDT transfer volume of the business addresses of storefront service providers has dropped by 43.20% (from 9.47 million to 5.38 million), while that of the business addresses of non-storefront service providers has decreased by 30.65% (from 42.57 million to 29.52 million).

item.title: Ethena is the sixth DeFi protocol to surpass $10 billion TVL
item.description: On August 12th, 21.co's Strategy Analyst, Tom Wan, posted on social media stating, "Ethena has emerged as the sixth DeFi protocol to surpass a TVL of $10 billion, and it is the second non-staking DeFi protocol to achieve this milestone following Aave."According to Dune data, Ethena's current TVL has attained $11.893 billion, with an sUSDe APY of 4.72%.

item.title: Presto Research Director: Ethereum is Ready to Win Wall Street's Approval
item.description: On August 12th, with the second-largest cryptocurrency ETH surging to its highest level in nearly four years, the U.S. Ethereum spot ETF witnessed its largest single-day inflow of funds. The data indicates that on Monday, the Ethereum spot ETF attracted a total inflow of slightly more than $1 billion. So far this year, the total inflow of these 9 funds has exceeded $8.2 billion.It turns out that the focus of "treasury companies" on ETH is an important driving force behind the token's rise. These listed companies are continuously expanding their digital asset reserves. According to the data compiled by Strategic EthReserve.xyz, the so-called "digital asset treasury companies" have absorbed more than $15 billion worth of ETH so far. Peter, the research director at the quant trading firm Presto, said: "Recent stablecoin legislation and the cryptocurrency roadmap outlined by the Chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission both suggest that the Ethereum blockchain behind Ether

item.title: Fosun International's Response to Stablecoin License Application: No Comment
item.description: On August 12th, market news indicated that Fosun has confirmed its application for a stablecoin license in Hong Kong and has already set up a complete stablecoin license application team. In response to the above news, Fosun stated that they have "no comment" at this moment.

item.title: US Stock Market ETH Strategy Stocks Surge in Pre-market Trading, Bitmine Up Over 7%
item.description: On August 12th, according to the market data of Rockflow, there was a general rise in the pre-market trading of US ETH strategy stocks. These include:· Bitmine increased by 7.29%;· Sharplink Gaming rose by 3.87%;· BTCS went up by 3.4%;· Circle went up by 1.04%;· Coinbase rose by 0.74%;· Strategy rose by 0.3%.

item.title: Binance Alpha Launches World3 (WAI)
item.description: On August 12th, Binance Alpha launched World3 (WAI).

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: CPI Bi-directional Risk on the Table, BTC in Range within High-Density Supply Zone — Risk Management and Phased Trading Strategy
item.description: August 12th: The market generally anticipated that the July CPI would rise by +0.2% month-on-month and by 2.8% year-on-year. The core CPI was expected to increase by +0.3% month-on-month and by 3.0% year-on-year. Regardless of whether the data is "hot" or "cold", it could trigger a market reaction in different directions but with equally strong volatility, posing a two-way risk to stocks, forex, bonds, and other risk assets in the short term.Bitunix Analyst Suggestion:For BTC, the range of 120k–123k is a zone with significantly high density of supply and concentrated selling pressure above. The levels of 116k and 112k below act as secondary supports. Without a volume breakout above the supply zone, it is likely to encounter rejection and fall back. In the case of colder-than-expected data (favorable to rate cuts), it is necessary to observe the trend of the US dollar and US Treasuries. If BTC witnesses a daily volume surge and breaks through the supply zone, it is expected to open u

item.title: Whale AguilaTrades ETH Long/Short, current position value $33.58M in ETH Long position
item.description: On August 12th, as monitored by on-chain analyst Yu Jin, contract transaction whale AguilaTrades. After suffering consecutive losses of 3 short ETH positions through stop-loss, with a total loss of $3.65 million, it has now switched from short to long. Starting 20 minutes ago, it took a long position on ETH with 15 times leverage. Currently, it holds 7700 ETH with a value of $33.58 million.

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin's upward momentum has started to slow down, cautioning the emergence of a potential double top pattern
item.description: On August 12th, Coindesk analyst Omkar Godbole stated that the upward momentum of Bitcoin has decelerated, raising the likelihood of a bearish technical pattern called a double top. When looking at the daily chart, the bulls on Monday were unable to maintain a breakthrough above the key Fibonacci level of $122,056. This pattern closely resembles the situation on July 14th. Two instances of failing to hold above a key price point with short pullbacks in between are typical features of a "double top" formation. The neck line of this formation is the lowest point reached during the brief pullback at $111,982, which is a crucial support level to monitor.If the price decisively drops below this neck line level, it will confirm the breakdown of the double top formation, potentially triggering selling pressure down to $100,000. The resistance levels are $120,000, $122,056, and $123,181. The support levels are $114,295, $111,982, and $100,000.As the market enters the period of today's CPI

item.title: Affected by the listing of the Upbit Korean won trading pair, CYBER experiences a temporary surge of over 178%.
item.description: On August 12th, according to HTX market data, affected by the listing on Upbit's Korean Won and USDT trading pairs, CYBER saw a brief surge of over 178% and is now priced at $5.12.
